title: Naturopathy Archives - Kuna Chiropractic: Dr Kevin Rosenlund, D.C.
author: Five
sitename: Kuna Chiropractic: Dr Kevin Rosenlund, D.C.
cleaned_text: How are Naturopathic Doctors Trained? Licensed North American Naturopathic Doctors There are seven Naturopathic colleges in North America, one of which is located in Ontario, Canada. The U.S. schools are located in Seattle, Washington; Portland, Oregon; Tempe, Arizona; Birmingham, Alabama and Bridgeport, Connecticut.
